text:
Join TEDxPenn at our first virtual salon! Our guest speaker, Dr. Stephanie Chia will be talking about the COVID-19 vaccine, and in particular, the intersection of vaccine distribution with racial inequality.
Register here: https://t.co/BHeWRYqiH1
#TEDxPenn #TEDx #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/qXMWgQSTfZ
